title: National Hispanic Heritage Month, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation declaring September 15 through October 15, 2025, as National Hispanic Heritage Month. It highlights the significant contributions of Hispanic-Americans to the nation's military, law enforcement, public service, and cultural enrichment. The proclamation emphasizes the administration's commitment to fostering opportunity and prosperity for all citizens. It calls on public officials, educators, and all Americans to observe the month with appropriate activities and programs. The proclamation was issued by President Donald J. Trump on September 22, 2025.
